Serialized Form

  • Package game

    • Class game.Game extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • level

          Level level
          This object reference variable to Level is used to store the level that the user is to play.

        • pathogen

          Pathogen pathogen
          This object reference variable to Pathogen is used to create the pathogen that the user is to control.

        • pathogenPic

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage pathogenPic
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to load the pathogen image.

        • background

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage background
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to load the background of the game.

        • tm

          javax.swing.Timer tm
          This object reference variable to Timer is used to create a new Timer that will be used to call the actionPerformed method every 3 milliseconds (so that the movement animation is smoother).

        • frame

          GameFrame frame
          This object reference variable to GameFrame is used to control the panels within the frame.

        • whiteBloodCell

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage whiteBloodCell
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to reference the image of a white blood cell.

        • healthBar

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage healthBar
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to reference the image of the health bar.

        • progressBar

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage progressBar
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to reference the image of the progress bar.

        • circles

          java.util.ArrayList<E> circles
          This object reference variable to an integer array list is used to store the location of the tracker circles on the progress bar.

        • counter

          int counter
          This integer is used to determine when the progress bar should be incrased.

        • miny

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage miny
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of a tiny version of the pathogen, depending on the level.

        • boss

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage boss
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of the boss.

        • targetPic

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage targetPic
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of the targetted cell.

        • ammoBar

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage ammoBar
          This object reference variable to BufferedImage is used to create the image of an ammunition bar (for level 2).

        • bossAnimationCounter

          int bossAnimationCounter
          This integer is used to determine whether or not the boss has been animated in a certain way yet, to determine what should be displayed next.

        • immunityCounter

          int immunityCounter
          This integer is used to determine how long the "IMMUNITY INCREASED" should be displayed.

        • score

          int score
          This integer is used to store the score of the user.

        • difficultyName

          java.lang.String difficultyName
          This object reference variable to String is used to store the name of the difficulty that the user is playing on.

        • difficultyFactor

          double difficultyFactor
          This double is used to store the difficulty rate of the level, which in turn will increase the spawn of white blood cells.

        • controls

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage controls
          This object reference varialbe to BufferedImage is used to create the image displaying where everything is on the screen and what it means to the user.

        • hasStarted

          boolean hasStarted
          This boolean is used to determine whether or not the game play has started.

        • ok

          javax.swing.JButton ok
          This button is used to remove the controls display and indicate that the user is ready to play the game.

        • time

          int time
          This integer is used to store the time that has passed (and will be used to display the teaching

    • Class game.Pause extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          GameFrame frame
          This object reference to GameFrame is used store the GameFrame that will contain this panel.

  • Package highscores

    • Class highscores.HighScores extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

  • Package window

    • Class window.GameFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • d

          javax.swing.JDialog d
          This variable is an object reference variable to JDialog and it used to create the help & about dialogs.

        • p

          Pause p
          This object reference variable to Pause is used to store the instance of Pause that will be displayed the pause screen.

        • g2

          Game g2
          This object reference variable to Game is used to store the Game object that is being used during the game.

        • g

          GamePanel g
          This object reference variable to GamePanel is used to store the GamePanel object that will be used for as the JPanel of all main menu elements.

        • info

          GameInfo info
          This object reference variable to GameInfo is used to store the data class that stores all of the information about the settings that the user is playing with and their name.

    • Class window.GamePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • keyAdapter

          java.awt.event.KeyAdapter keyAdapter
          This object reference variable to KeyAdapter is used to track input by the user via keyboard. It is used to temporarily pause the screens so that the user can see the messages displayed, and continue by pressing a key.

        • mouseListener

          java.awt.event.MouseListener mouseListener
          This object reference variable to MouseListener is used to access methods that are used to listen to mouse actions.

        • shouldDraw

          boolean shouldDraw
          This boolean is used to determine when a box should be drawn around the user's selections in the difficultySelection screen.

        • nameField

          javax.swing.JTextField nameField
          This object reference variable to JTextField is used as a place for the user to enter their name.

        • timer

          java.util.Timer timer
          This object reference variable to Timer is used to set up a timer so that the mainmenu call is delayed, therefore allowing the user to see the splash screen.

        • interval

          int interval
          This integer is used to cue when the main menu should be called (after the splash screen has finished).

        • frame

          GameFrame frame
          This object reference variable to GameFrame is used to store the frame that is used to contain the GamePanel.

        • musicOnOff

          javax.swing.JButton musicOnOff
          This object reference variable to JButton is used to create the on and off button for music in settings.

        • ais

          javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream ais
          This object reference variable to AudioInputStreams is used to reference the music that is to be played.

        • clip

          javax.sound.sampled.Clip clip
          This object reference variable to Clip is used to play the music.

        • musicOn

          boolean musicOn
          This boolean variable is used to determine whether or not the music is playing, which is used to determine which button should display in settings.

        • learningOnOff

          javax.swing.JButton learningOnOff
          This object reference variable to JButton is used to create the button that is used to turn the learning mode of the game on or off.
